.
Female. Subgenital plate short, triangular, wider than long, and with a shallow broad triangular notch at the apex ( Figure 7F ).
Color. Deep foliage-green. Costal vein white and black, each tegmen with a black spot at the base of the green subcostal vein.

Length of body: male 24.0â€“28.0, female 29.0â€“30.0; length to apex of ovipositor 36.0; length to tip of wing: male 53.0â€“53.5, female 59.0; length of pronotum: male 5.5, female 6.0; length of tegmen: male 40.0â€“43.0, female 47.0; largest width of tegmen: male 8.0, female 9.0; length of hind wing: male 46.5â€“48.5, female 52.5; length of anterior femur: male 6.5, female 8.5; length of median femur: male 10.5, female 12.5; length of posterior femur: male 23.5, female 31.5; length of ovipositor 10.0.
